contents.text: The "job-id" of the Job Object just created, etc., as defined in [RFC2911] for Print-Job, Print-URI, and Create-Job requests.
contents.zh-CHS: 刚刚创建的作业对象的“作业id”等，如[RFC2911]中为打印作业、打印URI和创建作业请求定义的。

contents.text: Group 4 to N: Subscription Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 组4到N：订阅属性

contents.text: These groups MUST be returned if and only if the client supplied Subscription Template Attributes and the operation was accepted.
contents.zh-CHS: 当且仅当客户端提供的订阅模板属性和操作被接受时，才必须返回这些组。

contents.text: See section 5.2 for details on the contents of each occurrence of this group.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关该组每次事件的内容，请参见第5.2节。

contents.text: 11.2. Other Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2. 其他业务

contents.text: This section defines other operations on Subscription objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节定义订阅对象上的其他操作。

contents.text: 11.2.1. Restart-Job Operation - Extensions for Notification
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.1. 重新启动作业操作-通知扩展

contents.text: The Restart-Job operation [RFC2911] is neither a Job Creation operation nor a Subscription Creation operation (see section 3.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 重启作业操作[RFC2911]既不是作业创建操作，也不是订阅创建操作（参见第3.2节）。

contents.text: For the Restart-Job operation, the client MUST NOT supply any Job Subscription Attributes Groups. The Printer MUST treat any supplied Job Subscription Attributes as unsupported attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于重新启动作业操作，客户端不得提供任何作业订阅属性组。打印机必须将任何提供的作业订阅属性视为不受支持的属性。

contents.text: For this operation, the Printer does not return a job-id or any Subscription Attributes groups because the Printer reuses the existing Job object with the same job-id and the existing Per-Job Subscription Objects with the same subscription-ids. However, after
contents.zh-CHS: 对于此操作，打印机不会返回作业id或任何订阅属性组，因为打印机会重用具有相同作业id的现有作业对象和具有相同订阅id的现有每作业订阅对象。但是,

contents.text: successful completion of this operation, the Printer generates a 'job-created' event (see section 5.3.3.4.3).
contents.zh-CHS: 成功完成此操作后，打印机将生成“创建作业”事件（请参阅第5.3.3.4.3节）。

contents.text: 11.2.2. Validate-Job Operation - Extensions for Notification
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.2. 验证作业操作-通知的扩展

contents.text: A client can test whether one or more Subscription Objects could be created using the Validate-Job operation. The client supplies one or more Subscription Template Attributes Groups (defined in section 5.3), just as in a Job Creation request.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端可以测试是否可以使用验证作业操作创建一个或多个订阅对象。客户端提供一个或多个订阅模板属性组（在第5.3节中定义），就像在作业创建请求中一样。

contents.text: A Printer MUST support this extension to this operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持此操作的此扩展。

contents.text: The Printer MUST accept requests that are identical to the Job Creation request defined in section 11.1.3.1, except that the request MUST NOT contain document data.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须接受与第11.1.3.1节中定义的作业创建请求相同的请求，但请求不得包含文档数据。

contents.text: The Printer MUST return the same groups and attributes as the Print-Job operation (section 11.1.3.1) with the following exceptions. The Printer MUST NOT return a Job Object Attributes Group because no Job is created. The Printer MUST NOT return the "notify-subscription-id" attribute in any Subscription Attribute Group because no Subscription Object is created.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须返回与打印作业操作（第11.1.3.1节）相同的组和属性，但以下情况除外。打印机不得返回作业对象属性组，因为未创建任何作业。打印机不得在任何订阅属性组中返回“通知订阅id”属性，因为未创建订阅对象。

contents.text: If the Printer would succeed in creating a Subscription Object, the corresponding Subscription Attributes Group either has no 'status-code' attribute or a 'status-code' attribute with a value of 'successful-ok-too-many-events' or 'successful-ok-ignored-or-substituted-attributes' (see sections 5.2 and 13). The status-codes have the same meaning as in Job Creation except the results state what "would happen".
contents.zh-CHS: 如果打印机将成功创建订阅对象，则相应的订阅属性组没有“状态代码”属性或“状态代码”属性，其值为“成功确定太多事件”或“成功确定忽略或替换属性”（参见第5.2和13节）。状态代码与创造就业机会中的含义相同，只是结果中说明了“将发生什么”。

contents.text: The Printer MUST validate Subscription Template Attributes Groups in the same manner as the Job Creation operations.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须以与创建作业操作相同的方式验证订阅模板属性组。

contents.text: 11.2.3. Get-Printer-Attributes - Extensions for Notification
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.3. 获取打印机属性-通知的扩展名

contents.text: This operation is extended so that it returns Printer attributes defined in this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作已扩展，以便返回在此文档中定义的打印机属性。

contents.text: A Printer MUST support this extension to this operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持此操作的此扩展。

contents.text: In addition to the requirements of [RFC2911] section 3.2.5, a Printer MUST support the following additional values for the "requested-attributes" Operation attribute in this operation and return such attributes in the Printer Object Attributes group of its response.
contents.zh-CHS: 除了[RFC2911]第3.2.5节的要求外，打印机必须支持此操作中“请求的属性”操作属性的以下附加值，并在其响应的打印机对象属性组中返回这些属性。

contents.text: 1. Subscription Template Attributes: Each supported attribute in column 2 of Table 1.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 订阅模板属性：表1第2列中的每个受支持的属性。

contents.text: 2. New Printer Description Attributes: Each supported attribute in section 6.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 新打印机描述属性：第6节中支持的每个属性。

contents.text: 3. New Group Name: The 'subscription-template' group name, which names all supported Subscription Template Attribute in column 2 of Table 1. This group name is also used in the Get-Subscription-Attributes and Get-Subscriptions operation with an analogous meaning.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 新组名：“订阅模板”组名，用于命名表1第2列中所有受支持的订阅模板属性。此组名称还用于“获取订阅属性”和“获取订阅”操作，具有类似的含义。

contents.text: 4. Extended Group Name: The 'all' group name, which names all Printer attributes according to [RFC2911] section 3.2.5. In this extension 'all' names all attributes specified in [RFC2911] plus those named in items 1 and 2 of this list.
contents.zh-CHS: 4. 扩展组名：“全部”组名，根据[RFC2911]第3.2.5节命名所有打印机属性。在此扩展名中，“全部”命名了[RFC2911]中指定的所有属性以及此列表第1项和第2项中命名的属性。

contents.text: 11.2.4. Get-Subscription-Attributes operation
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.4. 获取订阅操作属性

contents.text: This operation allows a client to request the values of the attributes of a Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作允许客户端请求订阅对象的属性值。

contents.text: A Printer MUST support this operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持此操作。

contents.text: This operation is almost identical to the Get-Job-Attributes operation (see [RFC2911] section 3.3.4). The only differences are that the operation is directed at a Subscription Object rather than a Job object, and the returned attribute group contains Subscription Object attributes rather than Job object attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作与获取作业属性操作几乎相同（请参见[RFC2911]第3.3.4节）。唯一的区别是，该操作针对的是订阅对象而不是作业对象，并且返回的属性组包含订阅对象属性而不是作业对象属性。

contents.text: Access Rights: The authenticated user (see [RFC2911] section 8.3) performing this operation MUST (1) be the Subscription Object owner, (2) have Operator or Administrator access rights for this Printer (see [RFC2911] sections 1 and 8.5), or (3) be otherwise authorized by the Printer's administrator-configured security policy to query the Subscription Object for the target job. Otherwise the Printer MUST reject the operation and return: the 'client-error-forbidden', 'client-error-not-authenticated', or 'client-error-not-authorized' status code as appropriate. Furthermore, the Printer's security policy MAY limit which attributes are returned, in a manner similar to the Get-Job-Attributes operation (see [RFC2911] end of section 3.3.4.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 访问权限：执行此操作的经过身份验证的用户（请参见[RFC2911]第8.3节）必须（1）是订阅对象所有者，（2）具有此打印机的操作员或管理员访问权限（请参见[RFC2911]第1节和第8.5节），或（3）由打印机管理员配置的安全策略以其他方式授权查询目标作业的订阅对象。否则，打印机必须拒绝操作并返回“客户端错误禁止”、“客户端错误未验证”或“客户端错误未授权”状态代码（视情况而定）。此外，打印机的安全策略可能会以类似于获取作业属性操作的方式限制返回哪些属性（请参见第3.3.4.2节的[RFC2911]结尾）。

contents.text: 11.2.4.1. Get-Subscription-Attributes Request
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.4.1. 获取订阅属性请求

contents.text: The following groups of attributes are part of the Get-Subscription-Attributes request:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性组是获取订阅属性请求的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set:
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：

contents.text: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in section [RFC2911] 3.1.4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 第[RFC2911]3.1.4.1节所述的“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性。

contents.text: Target: The "printer-uri" attribute which defines the target for this operation as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标：“打印机uri”属性，用于定义[RFC2911]第3.1.5节所述的此操作的目标。

contents.text: Requesting User Name: The "requesting-user-name" attribute SHOULD be supplied by the client as described in [RFC2911] section 8.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求用户名：“请求用户名”属性应由客户提供，如[RFC2911]第8.3节所述。

contents.text: 11.2.4.1.1. "notify-subscription-id" (integer (1:MAX))

The client MUST supply this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. This attribute specifies the Subscription Object from which the client is requesting attributes. If the client omits this attribute, the Printer MUST reject this request with the 'client-error-bad-request' status code.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端必须提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。此属性指定客户端向其请求属性的订阅对象。如果客户端忽略此属性，打印机必须使用“客户端错误错误请求”状态代码拒绝此请求。

contents.text: 11.2.4.1.2. "requested-attributes" (1setOf keyword)
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.4.1.2. “请求的属性”（1setOf关键字）

contents.text: The client OPTIONALLY supplies this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. This attribute specifies the attributes of the specified Subscription Object that the Printer MUST return in the response. Each value of this attribute is either an attribute name (defined in sections 5.3 and 5.4) or an attribute group name. The attribute group names are:
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端可以选择提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。此属性指定打印机必须在响应中返回的指定订阅对象的属性。该属性的每个值都是属性名称（在第5.3节和第5.4节中定义）或属性组名称。属性组名称为：

contents.text: - 'subscription-template': all attributes that are both defined in section 5.3 and present on the specified Subscription Object (column 1 of Table 1).
contents.zh-CHS: - “订阅模板”：在第5.3节中定义并显示在指定订阅对象（表1第1列）上的所有属性。

contents.text: - 'subscription-description': all attributes that are both defined in section 5.4 and present on the specified Subscription Object (Table 2).
contents.zh-CHS: - “订阅说明”：在第5.4节中定义并在指定订阅对象上存在的所有属性（表2）。

contents.text: - 'all': all attributes that are present on the specified Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: - “全部”：指定订阅对象上存在的所有属性。

contents.text: A Printer MUST support all these group names.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持所有这些组名。

contents.text: If the client omits this attribute, the Printer MUST respond as if this attribute had been supplied with a value of 'all'.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果客户端忽略此属性，则打印机必须响应，就像此属性已提供值“all”一样。

contents.text: 11.2.4.2. Get-Subscription-Attributes Response
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.4.2. 获取订阅属性响应

contents.text: The Printer returns the following sets of attributes as part of the Get-Subscription-Attributes Response:
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机返回以下属性集，作为获取订阅属性响应的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Status Message: Same as [RFC2911].
contents.zh-CHS: 状态消息：与[RFC2911]相同。

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.2. The "attributes-natural-language" MAY be the natural language of the Subscription Object, rather than the one requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.2节所述。“属性自然语言”可能是订阅对象的自然语言，而不是请求的自然语言。

contents.text: Group 2: Unsupported Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第2组：不支持的属性

contents.text: See [RFC2911] section 3.1.7 and section 3.2.5.2 for details on returning Unsupported Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关返回不支持属性的详细信息，请参见[RFC2911]第3.1.7节和第3.2.5.2节。

contents.text: The response NEED NOT contain the "requested-attributes" operation attribute with any supplied keyword values that were requested by the client but are not supported by the IPP object. If the Printer object does return unsupported attributes referenced in the "requested-attributes" operation attribute, the values of the "requested-attributes" attribute returned MUST include only the unsupported keywords that were requested by the client. If the client had requested a group name, such as 'all', the resulting unsupported attributes returned MUST NOT include attribute keyword names described in the standard but not supported by the implementation.
contents.zh-CHS: 响应不需要包含“请求的属性”操作属性以及客户端请求但IPP对象不支持的任何提供的关键字值。如果打印机对象返回“请求的属性”操作属性中引用的不受支持的属性，则返回的“请求的属性”属性的值必须仅包括客户端请求的不受支持的关键字。如果客户端请求了组名，例如“all”，则返回的结果不受支持的属性不得包括标准中描述但实现不支持的属性关键字名称。

contents.text: Group 3: Subscription Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 组3：订阅属性

contents.text: This group contains a set of attributes with their current values. Each attribute returned in this group:
contents.zh-CHS: 此组包含一组属性及其当前值。此组中返回的每个属性：

contents.text: a) MUST be specified by the "requested-attributes" attribute in the request, AND
contents.zh-CHS: a) 必须由请求中的“请求的属性”属性指定，并且

contents.text: b) MUST be present on the specified Subscription Object AND
contents.zh-CHS: b) 必须存在于指定的订阅对象上，并且

contents.text: c) MUST NOT be restricted by the security policy in force. For example, a Printer MAY prohibit a client who is not the creator of a Subscription Object from seeing some or all of its attributes. See [RFC2911] end of section 3.3.4.2 and section 8.
contents.zh-CHS: c) 不得受现行安全策略的限制。例如，打印机可能会禁止不是订阅对象创建者的客户端查看其部分或全部属性。参见[RFC2911]第3.3.4.2节末尾和第8节。

contents.text: The Printer can return the attributes of the Subscription Object in any order. The client MUST accept the attributes in any order.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机可以按任意顺序返回订阅对象的属性。客户端必须以任何顺序接受属性。

contents.text: 11.2.5. Get-Subscriptions operation
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.5. 获取订阅操作

contents.text: This operation allows a client to retrieve the values of attributes of all Subscription Objects belonging to a Job or Printer.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作允许客户端检索属于作业或打印机的所有订阅对象的属性值。

contents.text: A Printer MUST supported this operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持此操作。

contents.text: This operation is similar to the Get-Subscription-Attributes operation, except that this Get-Subscriptions operation returns attributes from possibly more than one object.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作类似于获取订阅属性操作，只是此获取订阅操作可能会从多个对象返回属性。

contents.text: This operation is similar to the Get-Jobs operation (see [RFC2911] section 3.2.6), except that the operation returns Subscription Objects rather than Job objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作类似于获取作业操作（请参见[RFC2911]第3.2.6节），只是该操作返回的是订阅对象而不是作业对象。

contents.text: Access Rights: To query Per-Job Subscription Objects of the specified job (client supplied the "notify-job-id" operation attribute - see section 11.2.5.1.1), the authenticated user (see [RFC2911] section 8.3) performing this operation MUST (1) be the Subscription Object owner, (2) have Operator or Administrator access rights for this Printer (see [RFC2911] sections 1 and 8.5), or (3) be otherwise authorized by the Printer's administrator-configured security policy to query the Subscription Object for the target job. To query Per-Printer Subscription Objects of the Printer (client omits the "notify-job-id" operation attribute - see section 11.2.5.1.1), the authenticated user (see [RFC2911] section 8.3) performing this operation MUST (1) have Operator or Administrator access rights for this Printer (see [RFC2911] sections 1 and 8.5), or (2) be otherwise authorized by the Printer's administrator-configured security policy to query Per-Printer Subscription Objects for the target Printer. Otherwise the Printer MUST reject the operation and return: the 'client-error-forbidden', 'client-error-not-authenticated', or 'client-error-not-authorized' status code as appropriate. Furthermore, the Printer's security policy MAY limit which attributes are returned, in a manner similar to the Get-Jobs and Get-Printer-Attributes operations (see [RFC2911] end of sections 3.2.6.2 and 3.2.5.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 访问权限：要查询指定作业的每个作业订阅对象（客户端提供了“通知作业id”操作属性-请参阅第11.2.5.1.1节），执行此操作的经过身份验证的用户（请参阅[RFC2911]第8.3节）必须（1）是订阅对象的所有者，（2）具有此打印机的操作员或管理员访问权限（请参阅[RFC2911]第1节和第8.5节），或（3）由打印机管理员配置的安全策略授权，以查询目标作业的订阅对象。要查询打印机的每台打印机订阅对象（客户端省略“通知作业id”操作属性-请参阅第11.2.5.1.1节），经过身份验证的用户（请参阅[RFC2911]第8.3节）执行此操作必须（1）具有此打印机的操作员或管理员访问权限（请参阅[RFC2911]第1节和第8.5节），或（2）由打印机管理员配置的安全策略授权，以查询目标打印机的每台打印机订阅对象。否则，打印机必须拒绝该操作并返回“客户端错误禁止”、“客户端错误未验证”或“客户端错误未授权”状态码（视情况而定）。此外打印机的安全策略可能会限制返回哪些属性，其方式类似于获取作业和获取打印机属性操作（请参见[RFC2911]第3.2.6.2节和第3.2.5.2节末尾）。

contents.text: 11.2.5.1. Get-Subscriptions Request
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.5.1. 获取订阅请求

contents.text: The following groups of attributes are part of the Get-Subscriptions request:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性组是Get Subscriptions请求的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.1节所述。

contents.text: Target: The "printer-uri" attribute which defines the target for this operation as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标：“打印机uri”属性，用于定义[RFC2911]第3.1.5节所述的此操作的目标。

contents.text: Requesting User Name: The "requesting-user-name" attribute SHOULD be supplied by the client as described in [RFC2911] section 8.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求用户名：“请求用户名”属性应由客户提供，如[RFC2911]第8.3节所述。

contents.text: 11.2.5.1.1. "notify-job-id" (integer(1:MAX))

If the client specifies this attribute, the Printer returns the specified attributes of all Per-Job Subscription Objects associated with the Job whose "job-id" attribute value equals the value of this attribute. If the client does not specify this attribute, the Printer returns the specified attributes of all Per-Printer Subscription Objects. Note: there is no way to get all Per-Job
contents.zh-CHS: 如果客户端指定此属性，打印机将返回与“作业id”属性值等于此属性值的作业关联的所有每作业订阅对象的指定属性。如果客户端未指定此属性，打印机将返回所有每打印机订阅对象的指定属性。注意：没有办法获得每个作业的所有信息

contents.text: Subscriptions known to the Printer in a single operation. A Get-Jobs operation followed by a Get-Subscriptions operation for each Job will return all Per-Job Subscriptions.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机在一次操作中已知的订阅。Get Jobs操作后跟每个作业的Get Subscriptions操作将返回每个作业的所有订阅。

contents.text: 11.2.5.1.2. "limit" (integer(1:MAX))

The client OPTIONALLY supplies this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. It is an integer value that determines the maximum number of Subscription Objects that a client will receive from the Printer even if the "my-subscriptions" attribute constrains which Subscription Objects are returned. The limit is a "stateless limit" in that if the value supplied by the client is 'N', then only the first 'N' Subscription Objects are returned in the Get-Subscriptions Response. There is no mechanism to allow for the next 'M' Subscription Objects after the first 'N' Subscription Objects. If the client does not supply this attribute, the Printer responds with all applicable Subscription Objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端可以选择提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。它是一个整数值，用于确定客户端将从打印机接收的最大订阅对象数，即使“我的订阅”属性约束返回的订阅对象。该限制是一个“无状态限制”，因为如果客户端提供的值为“N”，则在Get Subscriptions响应中仅返回前“N”个订阅对象。没有允许在第一个“N”订阅对象之后再出现下一个“M”订阅对象的机制。如果客户端不提供此属性，打印机将使用所有适用的订阅对象进行响应。

contents.text: 11.2.5.1.3. "requested-attributes" (1setOf type2 keyword)
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.5.1.3. “请求的属性”（1setOf type2关键字）

contents.text: The client OPTIONALLY supplies this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. This attribute specifies the attributes of the specified Subscription Objects that the Printer MUST return in the response. Each value of this attribute is either an attribute name (defined in sections 5.3 and 5.4) or an attribute group name (defined in section 11.2.4.1). If the client omits this attribute, the Printer MUST respond as if the client had supplied this attribute with the one value: 'notify-subscription-id'.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端可以选择提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。此属性指定打印机必须在响应中返回的指定订阅对象的属性。该属性的每个值都是属性名称（在第5.3节和第5.4节中定义）或属性组名称（在第11.2.4.1节中定义）。如果客户端忽略此属性，打印机必须作出响应，就像客户端为此属性提供了一个值：“通知订阅id”。

contents.text: 11.2.5.1.4. "my-subscriptions" (boolean)

The client OPTIONALLY supplies this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. If the value is 'false', the Printer MUST consider the Subscription Objects from all users as candidates. If the value is 'true', the Printer MUST return the Subscription Objects created by the requesting user of this request. If the client does not supply this attribute, the Printer MUST respond as if the client had supplied the attribute with a value of 'false'. The means for authenticating the requesting user and matching the Subscription Objects is similar to that for Jobs which is described in [RFC2911] section 8.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端可以选择提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。如果该值为“false”，则打印机必须将所有用户的订阅对象视为候选对象。如果该值为“true”，则打印机必须返回此请求的请求用户创建的订阅对象。如果客户端未提供此属性，则打印机必须作出响应，就像客户端提供的属性值为“false”一样。验证请求用户和匹配订阅对象的方法类似于[RFC2911]第8节中描述的作业方法。

contents.text: 11.2.5.2 Get-Subscriptions Response
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.5.2 获取订阅响应

contents.text: The Printer returns the following sets of attributes as part of the Get-Subscriptions Response:
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机返回以下属性集作为获取订阅响应的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Status Message: Same as [RFC2911].
contents.zh-CHS: 状态消息：与[RFC2911]相同。

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.2节所述。

contents.text: Group 2: Unsupported Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第2组：不支持的属性

contents.text: Same as for Get-Subscription-Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 与获取订阅属性相同。

contents.text: Groups 3 to N: Subscription Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 组3到组N：订阅属性

contents.text: The Printer responds with one Subscription Attributes Group for each requested Subscription Object (see the "notify-job-id" attribute in the Operation Attributes Group of this operation).
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机为每个请求的订阅对象响应一个订阅属性组（请参阅此操作的操作属性组中的“通知作业id”属性）。

contents.text: The Printer returns Subscription Objects in any order.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机以任意顺序返回订阅对象。

contents.text: If the "limit" attribute is present in the Operation Attributes group of the request, the number of Subscription Attributes Groups in the response MUST NOT exceed the value of the "limit" attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果请求的操作属性组中存在“限制”属性，则响应中订阅属性组的数量不得超过“限制”属性的值。

contents.text: It there are no Subscription Objects associated with the specified Job or Printer, the Printer MUST return zero Subscription Attributes Groups and it MUST NOT treat this case as an error,
contents.zh-CHS: 如果没有与指定作业或打印机关联的订阅对象，则打印机必须返回零订阅属性组，并且不能将此情况视为错误，

contents.text: i.e., the status-code MUST be 'successful-ok' unless something else causes the status code to have some other value.
contents.zh-CHS: i、 例如，状态代码必须为“成功正常”，除非其他原因导致状态代码具有其他值。

contents.text: See the Group 3 response (Subscription Attributes Group) of the Get-Subscription-Attributes operation (section 11.2.4.2) for the attributes that a Printer returns in this group.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关打印机在此组中返回的属性，请参阅获取订阅属性操作（第11.2.4.2节）的组3响应（订阅属性组）。

contents.text: 11.2.6. Renew-Subscription operation
This operation allows a client to request the Printer to extend the lease on a Per-Printer Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作允许客户端请求打印机在每打印机订阅对象上延长租约。

contents.text: The Printer MUST support this operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持此操作。

contents.text: The Printer MUST accept this request for a Per-Printer Subscription Object in any of the target Printer's states, i.e., 'idle', 'processing', or 'stopped', but MUST NOT change the Printer's "printer-state" attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须在目标打印机的任何状态（即“空闲”、“正在处理”或“已停止”）下接受每个打印机订阅对象的请求，但不得更改打印机的“打印机状态”属性。

contents.text: The Printer MUST reject this request for a Per-Job Subscription Object because it has no lease (see section 5.4.3). The status code returned MUST be 'client-error-not-possible'.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须拒绝每个作业订阅对象的请求，因为它没有租约（请参阅第5.4.3节）。返回的状态代码必须为“客户端错误不可能”。

contents.text: Access Rights: The authenticated user (see [RFC2911] section 8.3) performing this operation MUST (1) be the owner of the Per-Printer Subscription Object, (2) have Operator or Administrator access rights for the Printer (see [RFC2911] sections 1 and 8.5), or (3) be otherwise authorized by the Printer's administrator-configured security policy to renew Per-Printer Subscription Objects for the target Printer. Otherwise, the Printer MUST reject the operation and return: the 'client-error-forbidden', 'client-error-not-authenticated', or 'client-error-not-authorized' status code as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 访问权限：执行此操作的经过身份验证的用户（请参见[RFC2911]第8.3节）必须（1）是每打印机订阅对象的所有者，（2）具有打印机的操作员或管理员访问权限（请参见[RFC2911]第1节和第8.5节），或（3）由打印机管理员配置的安全策略授权，以续订目标打印机的每打印机订阅对象。否则，打印机必须拒绝操作并返回“客户端错误禁止”、“客户端错误未验证”或“客户端错误未授权”状态代码（视情况而定）。

contents.text: 11.2.6.1. Renew-Subscription Request
The following groups of attributes are part of the Renew-Subscription Request:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性组是续订订阅请求的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.1节所述。

contents.text: Target: The "printer-uri" attribute which defines the target for this operation as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标：“打印机uri”属性，用于定义[RFC2911]第3.1.5节所述的此操作的目标。

contents.text: Requesting User Name: The "requesting-user-name" (name(MAX)) attribute SHOULD be supplied by the client as described in [RFC2911] section 8.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求用户名：“请求用户名”（Name（MAX））属性应由客户提供，如[RFC2911]第8.3节所述。

contents.text: 11.2.6.1.1. "notify-subscription-id" (integer (1:MAX))

The client MUST supply this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. This attribute specifies the Per-Printer Subscription Object whose lease the Printer MUST renew. If the client omits this attribute, the Printer MUST reject this request with the 'client-error-bad-request' status code.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端必须提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。此属性指定打印机必须续订其租约的每打印机订阅对象。如果客户端忽略此属性，打印机必须使用“客户端错误错误请求”状态代码拒绝此请求。

contents.text: Group 2: Subscription Template Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 组2：订阅模板属性

contents.text: 11.2.6.1.2. "notify-lease-duration" (integer(0:MAX))

The client MAY supply this attribute. It indicates the number of seconds to renew the lease for the specified Subscription Object. A value of 0 requests an infinite lease (which MAY require Operator access rights). If the client omits this attribute, the Printer MUST use the value of the Printer's "notify-lease-duration-default" attribute. See section 5.3.8 for more details.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端可以提供此属性。它指示为指定订阅对象续订租约的秒数。值0请求无限期租约（可能需要操作员访问权限）。如果客户端忽略此属性，则打印机必须使用打印机的“notify lease duration default”属性的值。详见第5.3.8节。

contents.text: 11.2.6.2. Renew-Subscription Response
The Printer returns the following sets of attributes as part of the Renew-Subscription Response:
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机返回以下属性集作为续订响应的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Status Message: Same as [RFC2911].
contents.zh-CHS: 状态消息：与[RFC2911]相同。

contents.text: The following are some of the status codes returned (see [RFC2911]:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是返回的一些状态代码（请参阅[RFC2911]：

contents.text: successful-ok: The operation successfully renewed the lease on the Subscription Object for the requested duration.
contents.zh-CHS: 成功确定：该操作在请求的持续时间内成功续订订阅对象上的租约。

contents.text: successful-ok-ignored-or-substituted-attributes: The operation successfully renewed the lease on the Subscription Object for some duration other than the amount requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 成功确定忽略或替换属性：该操作成功地将订阅对象上的租约续订了一段时间（请求的金额除外）。

contents.text: client-error-not-possible: The operation failed because the "notify-subscription-id" Operation attribute identified a Per-Job Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端错误不可能：操作失败，因为“通知订阅id”操作属性标识了每个作业订阅对象。

contents.text: client-error-not-found: The operation failed because the "notify-subscription-id" Operation attribute identified a non-existent Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 找不到客户端错误：操作失败，因为“通知订阅id”操作属性标识了不存在的订阅对象。

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.2. The "attributes-natural-language" MAY be the natural language of the Subscription Object, rather than the one requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.2节所述。“属性自然语言”可能是订阅对象的自然语言，而不是请求的自然语言。

contents.text: Group 2: Unsupported Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第2组：不支持的属性

contents.text: See [RFC2911] section 3.1.7 for details on returning Unsupported Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关返回不支持的属性的详细信息，请参见[RFC2911]第3.1.7节。

contents.text: Group 3: Subscription Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 组3：订阅属性

contents.text: The Printer MUST return the following Subscription Attribute:
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须返回以下订阅属性：

contents.text: 11.2.6.2.1. "notify-lease-duration" (integer(0:MAX))

The value of this attribute MUST be the number of seconds that the Printer has granted for the lease of the Subscription Object (see section 5.3.8 for details, such as the value of this attribute when the Printer doesn't support the requested value).
contents.zh-CHS: 此属性的值必须是打印机为租用订阅对象而授予的秒数（有关详细信息，请参阅第5.3.8节，例如打印机不支持请求的值时此属性的值）。

contents.text: 11.2.7. Cancel-Subscription operation
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.7. 取消订阅操作

contents.text: This operation allows a client to delete a Subscription Object and stop the Printer from delivering more Event Notifications. Once performed, there is no way to reference the Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 此操作允许客户端删除订阅对象并停止打印机发送更多事件通知。一旦执行，就无法引用订阅对象。

contents.text: A Printer MUST supported this operation.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须支持此操作。

contents.text: The Printer MUST accept this request in any of the target Printer's states, i.e., 'idle', 'processing', or 'stopped', but MUST NOT change the Printer's "printer-state" attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机必须在目标打印机的任何状态（即“空闲”、“正在处理”或“已停止”）下接受此请求，但不得更改打印机的“打印机状态”属性。

contents.text: If the specified Subscription Object is a Per-Job Subscription Object, the Printer MUST accept this request in any of the target Job's states, but MUST NOT change the Job's "job-state" attribute or affect the Job.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果指定的订阅对象是每作业订阅对象，则打印机必须在任何目标作业状态下接受此请求，但不得更改作业的“作业状态”属性或影响作业。

contents.text: Note: There is no way to change any attributes on a Subscription Object, except the "notify-lease-duration" attribute (using the Renew-Subscription operation). In order to change other attributes, a client performs a Subscription Creation Operation and Cancel-Subscription operation on the old Subscription Object. If the client
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：除了“通知租赁期限”属性（使用续订订阅操作）外，无法更改订阅对象上的任何属性。为了更改其他属性，客户端对旧订阅对象执行订阅创建操作和取消订阅操作。如果客户

contents.text: wants to avoid missing Event Notifications, it performs the Subscription Creation Operation first. If this order would create too many Subscription Objects on the Printer, the client reverses the order.
contents.zh-CHS: 为了避免丢失事件通知，它首先执行订阅创建操作。如果此订单会在打印机上创建太多订阅对象，则客户端会反转订单。

contents.text: Access Rights: The authenticated user (see [RFC2911] section 8.3) performing this operation MUST (1) be the owner of the Subscription Object, (2) have Operator or Administrator access rights for the Printer (see [RFC2911] sections 1 and 8.5), or (3) be otherwise authorized by the Printer's administrator-configured security policy to cancel the target Subscription Object. Otherwise, the Printer MUST reject the operation and return: the 'client-error-forbidden', 'client-error-not-authenticated', or 'client-error-not-authorized' status code as appropriate.
contents.zh-CHS: 访问权限：执行此操作的经过身份验证的用户（请参见[RFC2911]第8.3节）必须（1）是订阅对象的所有者，（2）具有打印机的操作员或管理员访问权限（请参见[RFC2911]第1节和第8.5节），或（3）由打印机管理员配置的安全策略以其他方式授权取消目标订阅对象。否则，打印机必须拒绝操作并返回“客户端错误禁止”、“客户端错误未验证”或“客户端错误未授权”状态代码（视情况而定）。

contents.text: 11.2.7.1. Cancel-Subscription Request
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.7.1. 取消订阅请求

contents.text: The following groups of attributes are part of the Cancel-Subscription Request:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下属性组是取消订阅请求的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.1节所述。

contents.text: Target: The "printer-uri" attribute which defines the target for this operation as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.5.
contents.zh-CHS: 目标：“打印机uri”属性，用于定义[RFC2911]第3.1.5节所述的此操作的目标。

contents.text: Requesting User Name: The "requesting-user-name" attribute SHOULD be supplied by the client as described in [RFC2911] section 8.3.
contents.zh-CHS: 请求用户名：“请求用户名”属性应由客户提供，如[RFC2911]第8.3节所述。

contents.text: 11.2.7.1.1. "notify-subscription-id" (integer (1:MAX))

The client MUST supply this attribute. The Printer MUST support this attribute. This attribute specifies the Subscription Object that the Printer MUST cancel. If the client omits this attribute, the Printer MUST reject this request with the 'client-error-bad-request' status code.
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端必须提供此属性。打印机必须支持此属性。此属性指定打印机必须取消的订阅对象。如果客户端忽略此属性，打印机必须使用“客户端错误错误请求”状态代码拒绝此请求。

contents.text: 11.2.7.2. Cancel-Subscription Response
contents.zh-CHS: 11.2.7.2. 取消订阅响应

contents.text: The Printer returns the following sets of attributes as part of the Cancel-Subscription Response:
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机返回以下属性集作为取消订阅响应的一部分：

contents.text: Group 1: Operation Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第1组：操作属性

contents.text: Status Message: Same as [RFC2911].
contents.zh-CHS: 状态消息：与[RFC2911]相同。

contents.text: The following are some of the status codes returned (see [RFC2911]:
contents.zh-CHS: 以下是返回的一些状态代码（请参阅[RFC2911]：

contents.text: successful-ok: The operation successfully canceled (deleted) the Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 成功确定：操作已成功取消（删除）订阅对象。

contents.text: client-error-not-found: The operation failed because the "notify-subscription-id" Operation attribute identified a non-existent Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 找不到客户端错误：操作失败，因为“通知订阅id”操作属性标识了不存在的订阅对象。

contents.text: Natural Language and Character Set: The "attributes-charset" and "attributes-natural-language" attributes as described in [RFC2911] section 3.1.4.2. The "attributes-natural-language" MAY be the natural language of the Subscription Object, rather than the one requested.
contents.zh-CHS: 自然语言和字符集：“属性字符集”和“属性自然语言”属性如[RFC2911]第3.1.4.2节所述。“属性自然语言”可能是订阅对象的自然语言，而不是请求的自然语言。

contents.text: Group 2: Unsupported Attributes
contents.zh-CHS: 第2组：不支持的属性

contents.text: See [RFC2911] section 3.1.7 for details on returning Unsupported Attributes.
contents.zh-CHS: 有关返回不支持的属性的详细信息，请参见[RFC2911]第3.1.7节。

contents.text: 12. Status Codes
contents.zh-CHS: 12. 状态代码

contents.text: The following status codes are defined as extensions for Notification and are returned as the value of the "status-code" parameter in the Operation Attributes Group of a response (see [RFC2911] section 3.1.6.1). Operations in this document can also return the status codes defined in section 13 of [RFC2911]. The 'successful-ok' status code is an example of such a status code.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下状态代码定义为通知扩展，并作为响应操作属性组中“状态代码”参数的值返回（参见[RFC2911]第3.1.6.1节）。本文件中的操作也可返回[RFC2911]第13节中定义的状态代码。“成功确定”状态代码就是此类状态代码的一个示例。

contents.text: 12.1. successful-ok-ignored-subscriptions (0x0003)
contents.zh-CHS: 12.1. 成功确定忽略的订阅（0x0003）

contents.text: The Subscription Creation Operation was unable to create all requested Subscription Objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 订阅创建操作无法创建所有请求的订阅对象。

contents.text: For a Create-Job-Subscriptions or Create-Printer-Subscriptions operation, this status code means that the Printer created one or
contents.zh-CHS: 对于创建作业订阅或创建打印机订阅操作，此状态代码表示打印机创建了一个或多个作业订阅

contents.text: more Subscription Objects, but not all requested Subscription Objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 更多订阅对象，但不是所有请求的订阅对象。

contents.text: For a Job Creation operation, this status code means that the Printer created the Job along with zero or more Subscription Objects. The Printer returns this status code even if other job attributes are unsupported or in conflict. That is, if an IPP Printer finds a warning that would allow it to return 'successful-ok-ignored-subscriptions' and either 'successful-ok-ignored-or-substituted-attributes' and/or 'successful-ok-conflicting-attributes', it MUST return 'successful-ok-ignored-subscriptions'.
contents.zh-CHS: 对于作业创建操作，此状态代码表示打印机创建了作业以及零个或多个订阅对象。即使其他作业属性不受支持或存在冲突，打印机也会返回此状态代码。也就是说，如果IPP打印机发现一条警告，允许它返回“成功的ok忽略订阅”和“成功的ok忽略或替换属性”和/或“成功的ok冲突属性”，它必须返回“成功的ok忽略订阅”。

contents.text: 12.2. client-error-ignored-all-subscriptions (0x0414)
contents.zh-CHS: 12.2. 客户端错误忽略了所有订阅（0x0414）

contents.text: This status code is the same as 'successful-ok-ignored-subscriptions' except that only the Create-Job-Subscriptions and Create-Printer-Subscriptions operation return it. They return this status code only when the Printer creates zero Subscription Objects.
contents.zh-CHS: 此状态代码与“成功确定忽略订阅”相同，只是只有“创建作业订阅”和“创建打印机订阅”操作返回此状态代码。只有当打印机创建零订阅对象时，它们才会返回此状态代码。

contents.text: 13. Status Codes in Subscription Attributes Groups
contents.zh-CHS: 13. 订阅属性组中的状态代码

contents.text: This section contains values of the "notify-status-code" (type2 enum) attribute that the Printer returns in a Subscription Attributes Group in a response when the corresponding Subscription Object:
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含“通知状态代码”（type2 enum）属性的值，当相应的订阅对象：

contents.text: 1. is not created or
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 未创建或

contents.text: 2. is created and some of the client-supplied attributes are not supported.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 已创建，但不支持客户端提供的某些属性。

contents.text: The following sections are ordered in decreasing order of importance of the status-codes.
contents.zh-CHS: 以下各节按状态代码重要性的降序排列。

contents.text: 13.1. client-error-uri-scheme-not-supported (0x040C)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.1. 不支持客户端错误uri方案（0x040C）

contents.text: This status code is defined in [RFC2911]. This document extends its meaning and allows it to be in a Subscription Attributes Group of a response.
contents.zh-CHS: 此状态代码在[RFC2911]中定义。本文档扩展了它的含义，并允许它位于响应的订阅属性组中。

contents.text: The scheme of the client-supplied URI in a "notify-recipient-uri" Subscription Template Attribute in a Subscription Creation Operation is not supported. See section 5.3.1.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持订阅创建操作中“通知收件人URI”订阅模板属性中客户端提供的URI的方案。见第5.3.1节。

contents.text: 13.2. client-error-attributes-or-values-not-supported (0x040B)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.2. 不支持客户端错误属性或值（0x040B）

contents.text: This status code is defined in [RFC2911]. This document extends its meaning and allows it to be in a Subscription Attributes Group of a response.
contents.zh-CHS: 此状态代码在[RFC2911]中定义。本文档扩展了它的含义，并允许它位于响应的订阅属性组中。

contents.text: The method of the client-supplied keyword in a "notify-pull-method" Subscription Template Attribute in a Subscription Creation Operation is not supported. See section 5.3.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 不支持订阅创建操作中“notify pull method”订阅模板属性中客户端提供的关键字的方法。见第5.3.2节。

contents.text: 13.3. client-error-too-many-subscriptions (0x0415)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.3. 客户端错误订阅过多（0x0415）

contents.text: The number of Subscription Objects supported by the Printer would be exceeded if this Subscription Object were created (see section 5.2).
contents.zh-CHS: 如果创建了此订阅对象，则打印机支持的订阅对象数将被超过（请参阅第5.2节）。

contents.text: 13.4. successful-ok-too-many-events (0x0005)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.4. 成功确定太多事件（0x0005）

contents.text: The client supplied more Events in the "notify-events" operation attribute of a Subscription Creation Operation than the Printer supports, as indicated in its "notify-max-events-supported" Printer attribute (see section 5.3.3).
contents.zh-CHS: 客户端在订阅创建操作的“notify Events”操作属性中提供的事件多于打印机支持的事件，如其“notify max Events supported”打印机属性所示（请参阅第5.3.3节）。

contents.text: 13.5. successful-ok-ignored-or-substituted-attributes (0x0001)
contents.zh-CHS: 13.5. 成功确定忽略或替换的属性（0x0001）

contents.text: This status code is defined in [RFC2911]. This document extends its meaning to include unsupported Subscription Template Attributes and it can appear in a Subscription Attributes Group.
contents.zh-CHS: 此状态代码在[RFC2911]中定义。此文档扩展了其含义，包括不受支持的订阅模板属性，并且可以显示在订阅属性组中。

contents.text: 14. Encodings of Additional Attribute Tags
contents.zh-CHS: 14. 附加属性标记的编码

contents.text: This section assigns values to two attributes tags as extensions to the encoding defined in [RFC2910]).
contents.zh-CHS: 本节将值分配给两个属性标记，作为[RFC2910]中定义的编码的扩展。

contents.text: The "subscription-attributes-tag" delimits Subscription Template Attributes Groups in requests and Subscription Attributes Groups in responses.
contents.zh-CHS: “subscription attributes tag”在请求中定义订阅模板属性组，在响应中定义订阅属性组。

contents.text: The "event-notification-attributes-tag" delimits Event Notifications in Delivery Methods that use an IPP-like encoding.
contents.zh-CHS: “event notification attributes标记”在使用类似IPP编码的传递方法中定义事件通知。

contents.text: The following table specifies the values for the delimiter tags:
contents.zh-CHS: 下表指定了分隔符标记的值：

contents.text: Tag Value (Hex) Meaning
contents.zh-CHS: 标记值（十六进制）含义

contents.text: 0x06 "subscription-attributes-tag" 0x07 "event-notification-attributes-tag"
contents.zh-CHS: 0x06“订阅属性标记”0x07“事件通知属性标记”

contents.text: 15. Conformance Requirements
contents.zh-CHS: 15. 一致性要求

contents.text: It is OPTIONAL for IPP clients and Printers to implement this Event Notification specification.
contents.zh-CHS: IPP客户端和打印机实现此事件通知规范是可选的。

contents.text: 15.1. Conformance requirements for clients
contents.zh-CHS: 15.1. 客户的合规性要求

contents.text: If this Event Notification specification is implemented by a client, the client MUST support the 'ippget' Pull Delivery Method and meet the conformance requirements as defined in [RFC3996] for clients. A client MAY support additional Delivery Methods.
contents.zh-CHS: 如果此事件通知规范由客户端实施，客户端必须支持“ippget”拉式交付方法，并满足[RFC3996]中为客户端定义的一致性要求。客户机可能支持其他交付方法。

contents.text: 15.2. Conformance requirements for Printers
contents.zh-CHS: 15.2. 打印机的一致性要求

contents.text: If this Event Notification specification is implemented by a Printer, the Printer MUST:
contents.zh-CHS: 如果此事件通知规范由打印机实现，则打印机必须：

contents.text: - meet the Conformance Requirements detailed in section 5 of [RFC2911].
contents.zh-CHS: - 满足[RFC2911]第5节中详述的一致性要求。

contents.text: - support the Subscription Template Attributes Group in requests and the Subscription Attributes Group in responses.
contents.zh-CHS: - 在请求中支持订阅模板属性组，在响应中支持订阅属性组。

contents.text: - support all of the following attributes:
contents.zh-CHS: - 支持以下所有属性：

contents.text: a. REQUIRED Subscription Object attributes in section 5. b. REQUIRED Printer Description object attributes in section 6. c. REQUIRED attributes in Event Notification content in section 8.
contents.zh-CHS: a. 第5节中要求的订阅对象属性。B第6节中要求的打印机描述对象属性。C第8节事件通知内容中的必需属性。

contents.text: - support the 'ippget' Pull Delivery Method and meet the conformance requirements as defined in [RFC3996] for Printers. The Printer MAY support additional Push and Pull Delivery Methods.
contents.zh-CHS: - 支持“ippget”拉送方式，并满足[RFC3996]中定义的打印机一致性要求。打印机可能支持其他推送和拉送方式。

contents.text: - deliver Event Notifications that conform to the requirements of section 9 and the requirements of the Delivery Method Document for each supported Delivery Method (the conformance requirements for Delivery Method Documents is specified in section 10).
contents.zh-CHS: - 针对每个支持的交付方法，交付符合第9节要求和交付方法文件要求的事件通知（第10节规定了交付方法文件的一致性要求）。

contents.text: - for all of the Job Creation Operations that the Printer supports, MUST support the REQUIRED extensions for notification defined in section 11.1.3.
contents.zh-CHS: - 对于打印机支持的所有作业创建操作，必须支持第11.1.3节中定义的通知所需的扩展。

contents.text: - meet the conformance requirements for operations as described in Table 16 and meet the requirements for Printers as specified in the indicated sub-sections of section 11:
contents.zh-CHS: - 满足表16所述操作的一致性要求，并满足第11节所示小节中规定的打印机要求：

contents.text: Table 16 - Printer Conformance Requirements for Operations
contents.zh-CHS: 表16-操作的打印机一致性要求

contents.text: Operation Printer Conformance Requirements
contents.zh-CHS: 操作打印机一致性要求

contents.text: Create-Printer-Subscriptions (section 11.1.2) REQUIRED Create-Job-Subscriptions (section 11.1.1) OPTIONAL Get-Subscription-Attributes (section 11.2.3) REQUIRED Get-Subscriptions (section 11.2.5) REQUIRED Renew-Subscription (section 11.2.6) REQUIRED Cancel-Subscription (section 11.2.7) REQUIRED
contents.zh-CHS: 创建打印机订阅（第11.1.2节）必需创建作业订阅（第11.1.1节）可选获取订阅属性（第11.2.3节）必需获取订阅（第11.2.5节）必需续订订阅（第11.2.6节）必需取消订阅（第11.2.7节）必需

contents.text: 16. Model for Notification with Cascading Printers (Informative)
contents.zh-CHS: 16. 带有级联打印机的通知模型（信息型）

contents.text: With this model (see Figure 2 below), there is an intervening Print server between the human user and the output-device. So the system effectively has two Printer objects. There are two cases to consider.
contents.zh-CHS: 在这个模型中（参见下面的图2），在人类用户和输出设备之间有一个中间的打印服务器。因此，系统实际上有两个打印机对象。有两种情况需要考虑。

contents.text: 1. When the Printer 1 (in the server) generates Events, the system behaves like the client and Printer in Figure 1. In this case, Printer 1 delivers Event Notifications that are shown as Event Notifications (A) of Figure 2.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 当打印机1（在服务器中）生成事件时，系统的行为与图1中的客户机和打印机类似。在这种情况下，打印机1发送的事件通知如图2的事件通知（A）所示。

contents.text: 2. When the Printer 2 (in the output-device) generates Events, there are two possible system configurations:
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 当打印机2（在输出设备中）生成事件时，有两种可能的系统配置：

contents.text: a) Printer 1 forwards the client-supplied Subscription Creation Operations to the downstream Printer 2 and lets Printer 2 deliver the Event Notifications directly to the Notification Recipients supplied by the Client (Event Notifications(C) in the diagram).
contents.zh-CHS: a) 打印机1将客户端提供的订阅创建操作转发给下游打印机2，并允许打印机2将事件通知直接传递给客户端提供的通知收件人（图中的事件通知（C））。

contents.text: b) Printer 1 performs the client-supplied Subscription Creation Operations and also forwards the Subscription Creation Operations to Printer 2 with the Notification Recipient changed to be the Printer 1. When an Event occurs in Printer 2, Printer 2 delivers the Event Notification (B) to Notification Recipient of Printer 1, which relays the received Event Notification (B) to the client-supplied Notification Recipient (as Event Notifications(A) in the diagram). Note, when a client performs a Subscription Creation Operation, Printer 1 need not forward the Subscription Creation Operation to Printer 2 if it would create a duplicate Subscription Object on Printer 2.
contents.zh-CHS: b) 打印机1执行客户端提供的订阅创建操作，并将订阅创建操作转发给打印机2，通知收件人更改为打印机1。当打印机2中发生事件时，打印机2将事件通知（B）传递给打印机1的通知接收者，后者将接收到的事件通知（B）转发给客户端提供的通知接收者（如图中的事件通知（A））。注意，当客户端执行订阅创建操作时，如果打印机1将在打印机2上创建重复的订阅对象，则不需要将订阅创建操作转发给打印机2。

contents.text: Note: when Printer 1 is forwarding Subscription Creation Operations to Printer 2, it may request Printer 2 to create additional Subscription Objects (called "piggy-backing"). Piggy-backing is useful when:
contents.zh-CHS: 注意：当打印机1将订阅创建操作转发给打印机2时，它可能会请求打印机2创建其他订阅对象（称为“piggy backing”）。在以下情况下，Piggy backing很有用：

contents.text: - Device A is configured to accept (IPP or non-IPP) requests from other servers.
contents.zh-CHS: - 设备A配置为接受来自其他服务器的（IPP或非IPP）请求。

contents.text: - Server S wants to receive Job Events that the client didn't request and Server S wants these Events for jobs it submits and not for other jobs.
contents.zh-CHS: - 服务器S希望接收客户端未请求的作业事件，服务器S希望为其提交的作业接收这些事件，而不是为其他作业接收这些事件。

contents.text:
server S                       device A
                        +------------+                 +------------+
                        |            |                 |            |
+--------+ Subscription | ###########|                 | ###########|
| client |--Creation ----># Printer #|  Subscription   | # Printer #|
+--------+  Operation   | # Object 1#|---Creation------|># Object 2#|
                        | ###|#######|   Operation     | ####|#|####|
                        +----|---^---+                 +-----|-|----+
+--------+     Event         |   |                           | |
|Notific-|<-Notifications(A)-+   +-- Event Notifications(B)--+ |
|ation Re|<-------------Event Notifications(C)-----------------+
|cipient |
+--------+
Figure 2 - Model for Notification with Cascading Printers
contents.zh-CHS: 图2-带有级联打印机的通知模型

contents.text: 17. Distributed Model for Notification (Informative)
contents.zh-CHS: 17. 分布式通知模型（信息型）

contents.text: A Printer implementation could use some other remote notification server to provide some or most of the service. For example, the remote notification server could deliver Event Notifications using Delivery Methods that are not directly supported by the output device or Printer object. Or, the remote notification server could store Subscription Objects (passed to it from the output device in response to Subscription Creation requests), accept Events, format the Event Notification in the natural language of the Notification Recipient, and deliver the Event Notifications to the Notification Recipient(s).
contents.zh-CHS: 打印机实现可以使用其他远程通知服务器来提供部分或大部分服务。例如，远程通知服务器可以使用输出设备或打印机对象不直接支持的传递方法传递事件通知。或者，远程通知服务器可以存储订阅对象（在响应订阅创建请求时从输出设备传递给它），接受事件，以通知收件人的自然语言格式化事件通知，并将事件通知传递给通知收件人。

contents.text: Figure 3 shows this partitioning. The interface between the output device (or Printer object) and the remote notification server is outside the scope of this document and is intended to be transparent to the client and this document.
contents.zh-CHS: 图3显示了这个分区。输出设备（或打印机对象）与远程通知服务器之间的接口不在本文档的范围内，旨在对客户端和本文档透明。

contents.text:
***********************
                                         *
                                         * Printer in combination
                                         * with the distributed
                                         * Notification Server)
                                         *
                                         * output device or server
                                         * +---------------+
   PDA, desktop, or server               * +  ###########  +
        +--------+                       * |  #         #  |
        | client |---IPP Subscription--------># Printer #  |
        +--------+   Creation operation  * |  # Object  #  |
                                         * |  #####|#####  |
                                         * +-------|-------+
                                         *         | Subscriptions
                                         *         | OR Event
     +------------+                      *         | Notifications
     |Notification|   IPP-defined        *  +------v--------+
     |Recipient   |<--Event Notifications---| Notification  |
     +------------+                      *  | Server        |
                                         *  +---------------+
                                         *
                                         *************************
*** = Implementation configuration opaque boundary
Figure 3 - Opaque Use of a Notification Server Transparent to the Client
contents.zh-CHS: 图3-对客户端透明的通知服务器的不透明使用

contents.text: 18. Extended Notification Recipient (Informative)
contents.zh-CHS: 18. 扩展通知收件人（资料性）

contents.text: The model allows for an extended Notification Recipient that is itself a notification server that forwards each Event Notification to another recipient (called the Ultimate Notification Recipient in this section). The Delivery Method to the Ultimate Recipient is probably different from the Delivery Method used by the Printer to the extended Notification Recipient.
contents.zh-CHS: 该模型允许一个扩展通知接收者，它本身就是一个通知服务器，将每个事件通知转发给另一个接收者（在本节中称为最终通知接收者）。发送给最终收件人的方法可能不同于打印机发送给扩展通知收件人的方法。

contents.text: This extended Notification Recipient is transparent to the Printer but not to the client.
contents.zh-CHS: 此扩展通知收件人对打印机透明，但对客户端不透明。

contents.text: When a client performs a Subscription Creation Operation, it specifies the extended Notification Recipient as it would any Notification Recipient. In addition, the client specifies the Ultimate Notification Recipient in the Subscription Creation Operation in a manner specified by the extended Notification Recipient. Typically, it is either some bytes in the value of "notify-user-data" or some additional parameter in the value of "notify-recipient-uri". The client also subscribes directly with the
contents.zh-CHS: 当客户端执行订阅创建操作时，它会像指定任何通知收件人一样指定扩展通知收件人。此外，客户端将以扩展通知收件人指定的方式在订阅创建操作中指定最终通知收件人。通常，它是“notify user data”值中的一些字节，或者是“notify recipient uri”值中的一些附加参数。客户端还直接向

contents.text: extended Notification Recipient (by means outside this document), since it is a notification server in its own right.
contents.zh-CHS: 扩展通知收件人（通过本文档之外的方式），因为它本身就是一个通知服务器。

contents.text: The IPP Printer treats the extended Notification Recipient like any other Notification Recipient and the IPP Printer is not aware of the forwarding. The Delivery Method that the extended Notification Recipient uses for delivering the Event Notification to the Ultimate Notification Recipient is beyond the scope of this document and is transparent to the IPP Printer.
contents.zh-CHS: IPP打印机将扩展通知收件人视为任何其他通知收件人，并且IPP打印机不知道转发。扩展通知收件人用于向最终通知收件人传递事件通知的传递方法超出了本文档的范围，并且对IPP打印机是透明的。

contents.text: Examples of this extended Notification Recipient are paging, immediate messaging services, general notification services, and NOS vendors' infrastructure. Figure 4 shows this approach.
contents.zh-CHS: 此通知基础架构的示例有：扩展的寻呼服务、通用的寻呼服务和即时通知服务。图4显示了这种方法。

contents.text:
PDA, desktop, or server                    server or output device
                                                   +---------------+
       +--------+                                  |  ###########  |
       | client |---Subscription Creation -----------># Printer #  |
       +--------+       Operation                  |  # Object  #  |
                                                   |  #####|#####  |
+------------+     +------------+   IPP-defined    +-------|-------+
|Ultimate    | any |Notification|<--Event Notifications----+
|Notification|<----|Recipient   |
|Recipient   |     +------------+
+------------+     (Notification Server)
Figure 4 - Use of an Extended Notification Recipient transparent to the Printer
contents.zh-CHS: 图4-使用对打印机透明的扩展通知收件人

contents.text: 19. Object Model for Notification (Normative)
contents.zh-CHS: 19. 通知的对象模型（标准）

contents.text: This section describes the Notification object model that adds a Subscription Object which together with the Job and Printer object provide the complete Notification semantics.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节介绍通知对象模型，该模型添加了订阅对象，该订阅对象与作业和打印机对象一起提供完整的通知语义。

contents.text: The object relationships can be seen pictorially as:
contents.zh-CHS: 对象关系可以从图形上看为：

contents.text: Figure 5 - Object Model for Notification
contents.zh-CHS: 图5-通知的对象模型

contents.text: s1, s2, and s3 are Per-Printer Subscription Objects and can identify Printer and/or Job Events.
contents.zh-CHS: s1、s2和s3是每打印机订阅对象，可以标识打印机和/或作业事件。

contents.text: s4, s5, and s6 are Per-Job Subscription Objects and can identify Printer and/or Job Events.
contents.zh-CHS: s4、s5和s6是每作业订阅对象，可以识别打印机和/或作业事件。

contents.text: 19.1. Object relationships
contents.zh-CHS: 19.1. 对象关系

contents.text: This sub-section defines the object relationships between the Printer, Job, and Subscription Objects by example. Whether Per-Printer Subscription Objects are actually contained in a Printer object or are just bi-directionally associated with them in some way is IMPLEMENTATION DEPENDENT and is transparent to the client. Similarly, whether Per-Job Subscription Objects are actually
contents.zh-CHS: 本小节通过示例定义打印机、作业和订阅对象之间的对象关系。每打印机订阅对象是否实际包含在打印机对象中，或者只是以某种方式与它们双向关联，取决于实现，并且对客户端是透明的。类似地，每个作业订阅对象是否实际

contents.text: contained in a Job object or are just bi-directionally associated with them in some way is IMPLEMENTATION DEPENDENT and is transparent to the client. The object relationships are defined as follows:
contents.zh-CHS: 包含在作业对象中或仅以某种方式与它们双向关联的对象依赖于实现，并且对客户端是透明的。对象关系定义如下：

contents.text: 19.2. Printer Object and Per-Printer Subscription Objects
contents.zh-CHS: 19.2. 打印机对象和每打印机订阅对象

contents.text: 1. The Printer object contains (is associated with) zero or more Per-Printer Subscription Objects (p1 contains s1-s3 Per-Printer Subscription Objects).
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 打印机对象包含（关联）零个或多个每打印机订阅对象（p1包含s1-s3每打印机订阅对象）。

contents.text: 2. Each Per-Printer Subscription Object (s1, s2, and s3) is contained in (or is associated with) exactly one Printer object (p1).
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 每个每打印机订阅对象（s1、s2和s3）仅包含在一个打印机对象（p1）中（或与之关联）。

contents.text: 19.3. Job Object and Per-Job Subscription Objects
contents.zh-CHS: 19.3. 作业对象和每作业订阅对象

contents.text: 1. A Job object (j1, j2, j3) is associated with zero or more Per-Job Subscription Objects (s4-s6). Job j1 is associated with Per-Job Subscription Object s4, Job j2 is associated with Per-Job Subscription Objects s5 and s6, and Job j3 is not associated with any Per-Job Subscription Object.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 作业对象（j1、j2、j3）与零个或多个每作业订阅对象（s4-s6）关联。作业j1与每个作业订阅对象s4关联，作业j2与每个作业订阅对象s5和s6关联，作业j3与任何每个作业订阅对象都不关联。

contents.text: 2. Each Per-Job Subscription Object is associated with exactly one Job object.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 每个每个作业订阅对象仅与一个作业对象关联。

contents.text: 20. Per-Job versus Per-Printer Subscription Objects (Normative)
contents.zh-CHS: 20. 每作业与每打印机订阅对象（标准）

contents.text: Per-Job and Per-Printer Subscription Objects are quite similar. Either type of Subscription Object can subscribe to Job Events, Printer Events, or both. Both types of Subscription Objects can be queried using the Get-Subscriptions and Get-Subscription-Attributes operations and canceled using the Cancel-Subscription operation. Both types of Subscription Objects create Subscription Objects which have the same Subscription Object attributes defined. However, there are some semantic differences between Per-Job Subscription Objects and Per-Printer Subscription Objects. A Per-Job Subscription Object is established by the client when submitting a job and after creating the job using the Create-Job-Subscriptions operation by specifying the "job-id" of the Job with the "notify-job-id" attribute. A Per-Printer Subscription Object is established between a client and a Printer using the Create-Printer-Subscriptions operation. Some specific differences are:
contents.zh-CHS: 每作业和每打印机订阅对象非常相似。任一类型的订阅对象都可以订阅作业事件、打印机事件或两者。这两种类型的订阅对象都可以使用“获取订阅”和“获取订阅属性”操作查询，也可以使用“取消订阅”操作取消。这两种类型的订阅对象都会创建定义了相同订阅对象属性的订阅对象。但是，每作业订阅对象和每打印机订阅对象之间存在一些语义差异。客户端在提交作业时以及使用“创建作业订阅”操作创建作业后，通过使用“通知作业id”属性指定作业的“作业id”，建立每个作业订阅对象。使用“创建打印机订阅”操作在客户端和打印机之间建立每打印机订阅对象。一些具体区别是：

contents.text: 1. A client usually creates one or more Per-Job Subscription Objects as part of the Job Creation operations (Create-Job, Print-Job, and Print-URI), rather than using the OPTIONAL Create-Job-Subscriptions operation, especially since Printer implementations NEED NOT support the Create-Job-Subscriptions operation, since it is OPTIONAL.
contents.zh-CHS: 1. 客户端通常创建一个或多个每作业订阅对象作为作业创建操作（创建作业、打印作业和打印URI）的一部分，而不是使用可选的创建作业订阅操作，特别是因为打印机实现不需要支持创建作业订阅操作，因为它是可选的。

contents.text: 2. For Per-Job Subscription Objects, the Subscription Object is only valid while the job is "not-complete" (see sections 5.4.3) while for the Per-Printer Subscription Objects, the Subscription Object is valid until the time (in seconds) that the Printer returned in the "notify-lease-expiration-time" operation attribute.
contents.zh-CHS: 2. 对于每作业订阅对象，订阅对象仅在作业“未完成”（参见第5.4.3节）时有效，而对于每打印机订阅对象，订阅对象在打印机在“通知租约到期时间”操作属性中返回的时间（秒）之前有效。

contents.text: 3. Job Events in a Per-Job Subscription Object apply only to "one job" (the Job created by the Job Creation operation or references by the Create-Job-Subscriptions operation) while Job Events in a Per-Printer Subscription Object apply to ALL jobs contained in the IPP Printer.
contents.zh-CHS: 3. 每作业订阅对象中的作业事件仅适用于“一个作业”（由作业创建操作创建的作业或由创建作业订阅操作创建的引用），而每打印机订阅对象中的作业事件适用于IPP打印机中包含的所有作业。

contents.text: 23. IANA Considerations
contents.zh-CHS: 23. IANA考虑

contents.text: This section contains the registration information that IANA added to the IPP Registry according to the procedures defined in RFC 2911 [RFC2911] section 6 to cover the definitions in this document. In addition, this section defines how Events and Delivery Methods will be registered when they are defined in other documents. The resulting registrations have been published in the http://www.iana.org/assignments/ipp-registrations registry.
contents.zh-CHS: 本节包含IANA根据RFC 2911[RFC2911]第6节中定义的程序添加到IPP注册中心的注册信息，以涵盖本文件中的定义。此外，本节还定义了在其他文档中定义事件和传递方法时如何注册它们。由此产生的注册已在http://www.iana.org/assignments/ipp-registrations 登记处。

contents.text: 23.1. Attribute Registrations
contents.zh-CHS: 23.1. 属性注册

contents.text: The following table lists all the attributes defined in this document. These have been registered according to the procedures in RFC 2911 [RFC2911] section 6.2.
contents.zh-CHS: 下表列出了本文档中定义的所有属性。已根据RFC 2911[RFC2911]第6.2节中的程序进行了登记。

contents.text:
Subscription Template attributes:                 Reference  Section
---------------------------------                 ---------  -------
notify-attributes (1setOf type2 keyword)          [RFC3995]  5.3.4
notify-attributes-supported (1setOf type2 keyword)
                                                  [RFC3995]  5.3.4.1
